title.newValue: Microsoft Search: Search & intelligence admin center, Search Usage Analytics, and Item Insights

description.newValue:
This release includes a new section in the Microsoft 365 admin center called "Search & intelligence." This section allows you to manage Microsoft Search features. This release also includes Search Usage Reports (find Usage Analytics on the Insights tab) and Item Insights (find Item Insights on the Configurations tab).
GA date: January CY2023
